评论详情: Love the item it was great and I can wear it anytime.
Looks just like the image and came with stickers, a lovely little thank you note, and the hair clips to hold it in place. My sister loved it.

Great quality! The Bandana's dense, pleasant to the touch. In addition to the star hair clips, I received a laundry instruction sheet with a note and stickers, which is absolutely adorable. Absolutely love this!
I love the design. It's very cute, very halloween, but it really doesn't fit my head and it keeps falling off.  I ended up giving this to a friend of mine who loves these, and she adores it.
It is exactly like the description. High quality. I love my order. Even came with a little surprise. :)
Very well made, but didn’t come with the clips in photo.

I ordered this hoping it would be big enough for my head since it was listed for humans too. Unfortunately it was more for the size of a small to medium size dog or a child. I returned it. It was just to small and looked silly on me. I gave it 2 Stars due to the quality of the material and print. It was made well just really small for an adult woman.
She loves it! Very high quality and soft, and she says it doesn’t hurt her head after wearing it for several hours like other brands do.

The bandana is so cute, incredibly well made, and with the help of a few Bobby pins it stayed in place all day. I even got a few bonus stickers in my package! The only issue is now I must buy all of the designs LOL
So happy with this product! Arrived on time, is well made and so cute! This is the second one i have purchased from the shop and both of them are perfect! Definitely recommend!

I normally don't go out of my way to write product reviews but I will for this. Did it take a little time to come in? Yes. Was it worth the wait? Well it's become a staple for my everyday work fit so I'd say yes. Every spooky person needs this in their possession. What really touched me was not only the helpful care instructions bit the very kind hand written note from the seller. It's very rare to receive personal appreciation from a seller now a days and it made me appreciate the product even more. This is my first bandana from this company and it will not be my last. I'm already planning on getting 3 more. If you're on the fence about this review gave you the nudge needed. Oh and the quality is peak too. With proper care I could see this lasting years.
Its perfect and so cute, exactly the type of head kerchief I've been looking for!
Sooooo freaking cute! It came with a personalized note and stickers! I love this!
Phenomenal quality bandana! I wore it for the first time today at work, I work at a hoodoo/ metaphysical shop. Everyone has asked me where to get this!
I love it! I bought some before from another store but this one seems to be super high quality and super cute!
